title: For the love of...Lolo

abstract: 'We were the last to arrive. It broke my heart to see my family with so much despair.'
description: When Ayen Guinto lost her beloved 'Lolo', her family lost the glue holding them together. She remembers him and wonders if the family should use his life as inspiration to move forward.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Title; B2002108; Western stories : expressions for the future : Digital Storytelling project; Active; Jul 2007
